cab.content: - * * if' *III(This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic fv1ajesty's Government.)Circulated by the Secretary of State for India. From Viceroy, Foreign Department, ith March 1918. (Received at 10 p.m.) Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier, quiet everywhere.Baluchistan. For Mari rising see separate telegram. General militarysituation unchanged.
